div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 88 Greece, western?, 1907 (460) Burial: c. 325-300 B.C. (T) Contents: 28+ AR Dyrrhachium: 1 st. Ambracia: 3 st. Alyzia: 1 st. Anactorium: 4 st. Coronta?: 1 st. Leucas: 2 st. Stratus: 1 st. Corinth: 15 st. Disposition: Athens Svoronos, JIAN 1908, pp. 258-60, illus. (4)
